question.string: How many languages are spoken in Turkmenistan?
Wieviele Sprachen werden in Turkmenistan gesprochen?
Quante lingue sono parlate in Turkmenistan?
Combien de langues sont parlées au Turkménistan?
Hoeveel talen worden er gesproken in Turkmenistan?
Câte limbi sunt vorbite în Turkmenistan?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?uri) as ?ss) WHERE { res:Turkmenistan dbo:language ?uri . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Language . }
